verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* convert \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* ashes.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w I|strong="H6963"\w* \w will|strong="H0784"\w* seed \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* into \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* houses \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Carioth: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w*, \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* convert \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath cast \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* commandments: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* idols \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w caused|strong="H0834"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w err|strong="H8582"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3063"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* houses \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* convert \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* pair \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* bruise \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w humble|strong="H6035"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* gone \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w woman|strong="H5291"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* sat \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* laid \w to|strong="H5921"\w* pledge \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* condemned \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Yet \w I|strong="H0834"\w* cast \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhite \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w strong|strong="H2634"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w oak|strong="H0437"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3423"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* led \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w through|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* might \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhite.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* Nazarites. \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w so|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3196"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* present \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Nazarites: \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* screak \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* wain screaketh \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* laden \w with|strong="H5699"\w* hay.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w flight|strong="H4498"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* possess \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* holdeth \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w rider|strong="H7392"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* stout \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w among|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
